definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Yes. You can't learn these words from textbooks; you just get them from daily life.
sentences.chinese: 對，這些詞課本上是學不到的，都得在生活中積累。

sentences.english: Read chapters 1 to 5 of the textbook.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀課本第一章到第五章。

sentences.english: The student announces the work rather plentiful, the play broadcasts in the province television station.
sentences.chinese: 學生髮表作品頗豐，編導的課本劇在省電視臺播放。
學生表演課本劇並造句。

sentences.english: Chinese-English translation is an important exercise in SEFC.
sentences.chinese: 漢翻英是現行中學英語課本中的一項重要練習。

sentences.english: Parents can purchase textbooks from any booksellers.
sentences.chinese: 家長可自行選擇書局購買課本。

sentences.english: They are solved in your book.
sentences.chinese: 它們在你的課本中解出。

sentences.english: When they put their newspapers down and open their books, it's Sophomores .
sentences.chinese: 如果他們把報紙放下，打開課本，那是大二學生。

sentences.english: It is a classic example of how not to design a new city centre.
sentences.chinese: 這對於設計新市中央是個最佳的背面課本。

sentences.english: In our edition, this is Page 29.
Pictures now dominate a once text-heavy book.
sentences.chinese: 現在圖片統治着曾經像課本一樣厚的書。

sentences.english: I need to study further into the text book before I'll be ready to take the test.
sentences.chinese: 我得進一步地詳讀課本，纔有把握應付考試。

sentences.english: Your teacher should not have to ask you every day to take out your book.
sentences.chinese: 你的老師不會每天都讓你把課本拿出來。

sentences.english: The class should have begun at 1:15, but the professor was half an hour late.
sentences.chinese: 課本應該在1點出15分開始，但教授遲到了半小時。

sentences.english: Put the text-books on your desk, please.
sentences.chinese: 請把你的課本放在書桌上。

sentences.english: Every five children shared one textbook.

definition: vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
to go to school/to attend school
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
